attributes.action: not allow Birmingham City's new stadium to be financed by Birmingham City Council.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am strongly against Birmingham City Council using public funds (ie. our Council tax)to pay for and build a new football stadium for Birmingham City Football Club.
If Birmingham City F.C. wants to build a new stadium, then they should finance it themselves.
Council tax is supposed to be used for the benefit of all tax players not the 25,000 Birmingham City fans in the area.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
